TopicTitle: Crashing Randomly With Quite a few Mods

Articles.Content: I've had crashes similar to this before and it seems to be random, however I can't seem to find any similarities nor cause. I know a few of my mods aren't fully up to date and a lot are for older versions, but this kind of crash has happened to me when I had just 1.7.x mods so I don't think they are the cause. Here is my Output_Log.txt: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1i7scMIsWYGeKQH_EMvrtpye25lxLDLls/view?usp=sharing

Could you also upload the error log? And please don't convert the log files to preformated text like .rtf. The logs are all simple text files and converting them will add a ton of useless code that will make them harder to read.

11 hours ago, Harry Rhodan said:

Could you also upload the error log? And please don't convert the log files to preformated text like .rtf. The logs are all simple text files and converting them will add a ton of useless code that will make them harder to read.

It was saying it couldn't save as a .txt without losing some parts from it... also didn't think of copying it before starting a new game so now I'll have to wait until it to happens again.

Edit: Aaaaand.... it happened again. this time I've uploaded the output_log.txt, the error.log, the KSP.log, and the crash.dmp (I doubt the last one will useful, but added it just in case)

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1X1V_zFfuub__t6CtzaKxUAxuppP8ceC1

Edited June 23, 2019 by smb64
Finally Crashed Again
I forgot to mention I'm using CKAN, so keep that in mind since I recall it can cause issues sometimes (I know how to install mods manually, I just find it a lot faster and easier)

You used up at least 92% of your RAM and during scene transition the game usually has some load spikes and suddenly need to use much more RAM . You either need to get rid of some part mods or try to force OpenGL or DX11, which both will most likely introduce graphical glitches.
okay now another question.... why are models in the list of parts extremely blue tinted, yet fine in the preview image and when placed?
okay... so apparently crashed again despite using the -force-d3d11 command line option.... added updated log files in the link from before

Well you're still at 92% memory usage but now your graphics driver is crashing. A clean reinstall of the driver is an option but as you're not actually saving RAM and are already experiencing glitches I would say the only way to go here is removing some of the heavier mods. Or buying more RAM.

You also added a space to -force-d3d11-no-singlethreaded, but I don't know if forcing it to use one or more threads will do any harm or good.
Your question about why the models in the SPH/VAB are tinted blue - It's a small, harmless bug that usually fixes itself after a restart. (Has happened to me before)

Actually i have the exact same problem (with crashes). And i noticed we are both using USI MKS, which is outdated. I installed it with all the other mods so cannot telll if it is it, but before i newer used it and newer have such crashes (but also had 1gb less mods, so dunno). Could it be MKS or mod conflict between MKS and something? Are you using USI LS?
